sourcesContent:
const sectionBgBase = 'bg-gradient-to-tr'
export const sectionBgLogin = `${sectionBgBase} from-sunset-orange to-purple-haze`
export const sectionBgLoginDark = `${sectionBgBase} from-deep-purple to-violet-dusk`
export const sectionBgError = `${sectionBgBase} from-warm-coral to-sunset-gold`
export const sectionBgErrorDark = `${sectionBgBase} from-warm-coral via-sunset-orange to-sunset-gold`

export const colorsBg = {
  white: 'bg-ghost-white text-charcoal',
  light: 'bg-off-white text-charcoal',
  primary: 'bg-purple-haze text-white',
  secondary: 'bg-sunset-orange text-white',
  success: 'bg-sky-blue text-white',
  danger: 'bg-warm-coral text-white',
  warning: 'bg-sunset-gold text-charcoal',
  info: 'bg-serene-blue text-white'
}

export const colorsBgHover = {
  white: 'hover:bg-light-silver',
  light: 'hover:bg-light-silver',
  primary: 'hover:bg-deep-purple',
  secondary: 'hover:bg-sunset-gold',
  success: 'hover:bg-sky-blue/90',
  danger: 'hover:bg-warm-coral/90',
  warning: 'hover:bg-sunset-gold/90',
  info: 'hover:bg-serene-blue/90'
}

export const colorsBorders = {
  white: 'border-light-silver',
  light: 'border-light-silver dark:border-slate',
  primary: 'border-deep-purple',
  secondary: 'border-sunset-orange',
  success: 'border-sky-blue',
  danger: 'border-warm-coral',
  warning: 'border-sunset-gold',
  info: 'border-serene-blue'
}

export const colorsText = {
  white: 'text-charcoal dark:text-ghost-white',
  light: 'text-slate dark:text-off-white',
  primary: 'text-purple-haze',
  secondary: 'text-sunset-orange',
  success: 'text-sky-blue',
  danger: 'text-warm-coral',
  warning: 'text-sunset-gold',
  info: 'text-serene-blue'
}

export const colorsOutline = {
  white: [colorsText.white, colorsBorders.white],
  light: [colorsText.light, colorsBorders.light],
  primary: [colorsText.primary, colorsBorders.primary],
  secondary: [colorsText.secondary, colorsBorders.secondary],
  success: [colorsText.success, colorsBorders.success],
  danger: [colorsText.danger, colorsBorders.danger],
  warning: [colorsText.warning, colorsBorders.warning],
  info: [colorsText.info, colorsBorders.info]
}

export const colorsOutlineHover = {
  white: 'hover:bg-light-silver hover:text-charcoal dark:hover:text-charcoal',
  light: 'hover:bg-light-silver hover:text-charcoal dark:hover:text-charcoal',
  primary: 'hover:bg-purple-haze hover:text-white',
  secondary: 'hover:bg-sunset-orange hover:text-white',
  success: 'hover:bg-sky-blue hover:text-white',
  danger: 'hover:bg-warm-coral hover:text-white',
  warning: 'hover:bg-sunset-gold hover:text-charcoal',
  info: 'hover:bg-serene-blue hover:text-white'
}

export const getButtonColor = (color, isOutlined, hasHover) => {
  const base = [
    isOutlined ? colorsText[color] : colorsBg[color],
    colorsBorders[color]
  ]

  if (hasHover) {
    base.push(isOutlined ? colorsOutlineHover[color] : colorsBgHover[color])
  }

  return base
}
